vars.name: customers
vars.expr: [{ id = 1; name = "Alice" }; { id = 2; name = "Bob" }; { id = 3; name = "Charlie" }]

vars.name: orders
vars.expr: [{ id = 100; customerId = 1; total = 250 }; { id = 101; customerId = 2; total = 125 }; { id = 102; customerId = 1; total = 300 }; { id = 103; customerId = 4; total = 80 }]

vars.name: result
vars.expr: [ for o in orders do for c in customers do if (o.customerId) = (c.id) then yield { orderId = o.id; customerName = c.name; total = o.total } ]
